resources.string: NWMap+ is an app that gives you the user the ability to look up information on popular neighbourhoods in New Westminster
This app was created by: Elisa Chu, Rost Myshkin and Davin Deol
It consists of 3 pages: Main, Neighbourhoods and Details (where we are going to be)
This page lists all the different neighbourhoods
We get the list from the database which is populated using the New Westminster data sets (Made by Elisa)
This page\'s main content is a list with a custom style for each item (Made by Davin)
When tapped, the next activity will open with a custom animation! (Made by Davin)
This page displays a map of the neighbourhood, a brief description and a bunch of toggles
First we load the map. Fun fact, just this part takes up almost 40% of the app\s total code (Made by Elisa)
These determines whether or not you want info about just the neighbourhood or w/ the surrounding area (Made by Elisa)
The description is simply some text that you can scroll through (Made by Rost)
This activity\s list uses checkboxes and directly affects what the map displays (Made by Davin + Elisa)
Notice how the item corresponding to what you selected has now vanished from the map. To bring it back, just tap the item again (Made by Elisa)
And if you\'re interested, you can actually share your interest in the city to Twitter (Made by Rost)
Now we can move onto the next feature, the ability to explore the city!
This page displays a map of the city (Made by Elisa)
What you do is click and region, any region, and the map will display that region
And that concludes our tour. We hope this tour has helped give you a little behind-the-scenes view of our app and maybe other apps. Have a good one! (Made by Davin)
